name: Crypt
description: A sacred site of worship and reflection; adventurers might receive blessings, research lore, or clash with zealots.
atmosphere: The crypt is filled with the musty scent of old stone and the subtle tang of decay. The air is cool and still, carrying the weight of centuries and the presence of the dead. The sound of dripping water and the soft echo of footsteps creates an atmosphere of reverence and the mysteries of mortality.
